SCS is your ''Friend in Campus'' at IIT BHU. 
 
We assist students for enhancing and strengthening their academics, skills and career choices as well as for their overall wellness. 
 
SCS aims to generate skilled and healthy (both at physical and mental level) human resources in the institute with adequate potential. 

It consists of mainly 5 teams - Wellness, Academic, Career, Skill Development and International Exchange. 

SCS Book Bank is a part of Wellness team which is established to encourage students to read books.

The Book Bank will consist of two components.
One being the SCS Book Bank, under which 50+ books of Self-Help, Entrepreneurship, Spirituality, Philosophy etc. are kept.

The second being Students Sharing Library, under which students can lend the books which are lying idle on their shelves to fellow students. 

The Book Bank is located in the SCS Office Room (Aryabhatta-II Hostel #C102), can be accessed on Sundays between 3:00 pm - 4:00 pm and on Wednesdays between 12:00 noon - 1:00 pm.
